009package PointOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014
015public class Gamma_Correction implements PlugInFilter {
016
017        @Override
018        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus img) {
019                return DOES_8G;
020        }
021    
022        @Override
023        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
024                // works for 8-bit images only 
025            int K = 256;
026            int aMax = K - 1;
027            double GAMMA = 2.8;   
028        
029            // create and fill the lookup table:
030            int[] Fgc = new int[K];                
031        
032            for (int a = 0; a < K; a++) {
033                double aa = (double) a / aMax;  // scale to [0,1]
034                double bb = Math.pow(aa,GAMMA); // gamma function
035                // scale back to [0,255]
036                int b = (int) Math.round(bb * aMax); 
037                Fgc[a] = b;  
038            }
039            
040            ip.applyTable(Fgc);  // modify the image
041        }       
042}
